content:
PutType Enum

Definition

Describes the possible effects of saving an object to WMI when using Put().

In this Article

public enum PutType
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
PutType

Fields

CreateOnly

Creates an object only; does not update an existing object.
None

No change.
UpdateOnly

Updates an existing object only; does not create a new object.
UpdateOrCreate

Saves the object, whether updating an existing object or creating a new object.
